title: Open source content management for your Git workflow
subtitle: Use Static CMS with any static site generator for a faster and more flexible web project

features.title: Static + content management = ♥
features.description: Get the speed, security, and scalability of a static site, while still providing a convenient editing interface for content.

features.title: An integrated part of your Git workflow
features.description: Content is stored in your Git repository alongside your code for easier versioning, multi-channel publishing, and the option to handle content updates directly in Git.

features.title: An extensible CMS built on React
features.description: Static CMS is built as a single-page React app. Create custom-styled previews, UI widgets, and editor plugins or add backends to support different Git platform APIs.

call_to_action.title: Getting started is simple and free.
call_to_action.subtitle: Choose a template that’s pre-configured with a static site generator and deploys to a global CDN in one click.
